title: Oru Nadhi Oru Pournami Lyrics Samurai
stanzas: <div>Oru Nadhi Oru Pournami Song Lyrics Samurai

oru nadhi oru pournami
or oadam ennidam undu

oru nadhi oru pournami
or oadam ennidam undu
oadakaaran oadakaaran
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru kaadu siru maedu
sila pookkal enndidam undu
pookkaaran pookkaran
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru pudhayal oru puviyal
mazhai vaasal ennidam undu(2)
alibaba alibaba
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru nadhi oru pournami
or oadam ennidam undu
oada kaaran oada kaaran
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru kaadu siru maedu
sila pookkal enndidam undu
pookkaaran pookkaran
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru pudhayal oru puviyal
mazhai vaasal ennidam undu(2)
alibaba alibaba
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru nadhi oru pournami
or oadam
oru pudhayal oru puviyal
mazhai vaasal

paaraamal pona
pournami ellaam
parthithu kodukkum oruvan
kaelaamal pona
padalai ellaam
thiratti kodukkum oruvan(2)

naan thaanaa
nee illai (2)

vaan mazhaiyil nenaitha
vaanavillai en madiyil
kattum oruvan
en dhegak kadhavu
jannal ellaam
thirandhu vaikkum oruvan

naan thaanaa
nee illai

en thaedal adhu vaeru
ada poda nee illai
oru nadhi oru pournami
or oadam ennidam undu
oada kaaran oada kaaran
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru kaadu siru maedu
sila pookkal enndidam undu
pookkaaran pookkaran
ada ungalil yaar undu

theeraamal pona
aasaigal ellaam
theerkka therindha oruvan
pogaatha ellai
poi vandhaalum
punnagai seiyyum oruvan

neethaanaa
naan illai (2)

oru karppu kannimai
karmam ellaam
kandu kollaatha oruvan
naan podhum podhum
ennum varaiyil
pudhumai seiyyum oruvan

neethaan
ayyo naan illai

naan thaedum
shingaaran ingu
yaeno yaen illai.

oru nadhi oru pournami
or oadam ennidam undu
oadakaaran oadakaaran
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru kaadu siru maedu
sila pookkal enndidam undu
pookkaaran pookkaran
ada ungalil yaar undu

oru pudhayal oru puviyal
mazhai vaasal ennidam undu(2)
alibaba alibaba
ada ungalil yaar undu
engalil yaar undu....

seo.title: Oru Nadhi Oru Pournami Lyrics Samurai
seo.description: Get the complete Oru Nadhi Oru Pournami Lyrics Samurai from Samurai. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Harrish Jeyaraj and sung by Nithyashree. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Samurai, Harrish Jeyaraj, Nithyashree, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
